text:
Alexandra Ruth Shipp (born July 16, 1991) is an American actress, singer-songwriter and musician. She is known for playing singer Aaliyah in the Lifetime television movie ' (2014) and Kimberly Woodruff in the Oscar-nominated movie "Straight Outta Compton" (2015).
Shipp is best known for playing Storm in the "X-Men" franchise, starting with ', and Abby Suso in the 2018 romantic comedy "Love, Simon".
